titleStmt.title: A survay of that foolish, seditious, scandalous, prophane libell, the protestation protested.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hall by Theodore C. Pease, The Leveller movement, 1916, on p. 71.
A reply to Henry Burton's The protestation protested, 1641.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
